title: Classic Chicken Fried Rice
instructions: Heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in large wok or skillet over medium-high heat
Add diced chicken, cook 5-6 minutes until fully cooked and lightly browned
Push chicken to one side, add beaten eggs to empty side
Scramble eggs until just set, then mix with chicken
Add frozen vegetables, cook 2-3 minutes until heated through
Add cold rice, breaking up clumps with spatula
Stir in soy sauce and sesame oil, cook 2-3 minutes
Add sliced green onions, toss to combine
Season with salt and pepper, serve immediately

title: Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry
ingredients: 1 lb flank steak, sliced thin against the grain
instructions: Mix cornstarch with 2 tablespoons water to create slurry, set aside
Heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in wok over high heat
Add beef slices in single layer, cook 2-3 minutes without stirring
Stir-fry beef another 1-2 minutes until browned, remove and set aside
Add remaining oil, then broccoli florets to wok
Stir-fry broccoli 3-4 minutes until bright green and tender-crisp
Add garlic and ginger, cook 30 seconds until fragrant
Return beef to wok, add soy sauce and oyster sauce
Add cornstarch slurry, toss everything for 1-2 minutes until sauce thickens
Drizzle with sesame oil, serve immediately over rice

title: Vegetable Pad Thai
ingredients: 8 oz rice noodles, soaked in warm water
2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, carrots, snap peas)
instructions: Drain soaked noodles and set aside
Mix tamarind paste, fish sauce, and brown sugar in small bowl
Heat oil in large wok or skillet over high heat
Add mixed vegetables, stir-fry 2-3 minutes until tender-crisp
Push vegetables to one side, add beaten eggs to empty side
Scramble eggs until just set, then mix with vegetables
Add drained noodles and sauce mixture to wok
Toss everything together 2-3 minutes until noodles are heated through
Add bean sprouts and green onions, toss for 1 minute
Serve immediately topped with crushed peanuts, lime wedges, and cilantro

title: Margherita Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F with pizza stone inside
Roll out dough on floured surface to 12-inch circle
Transfer to parchment paper, brush edges with olive oil
Spread sauce evenly, leaving 1-inch border
Add mozzarella slices, season with salt and pepper
Slide pizza onto hot stone, bake 10-12 minutes until golden
Top with fresh basil leaves, drizzle with remaining olive oil
Cool 2 minutes before slicing and serving

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Season chicken with garlic powder, salt, and pepper
Heat olive oil in skillet over medium-high heat
Cook chicken 6-7 minutes per side until internal temp reaches 165°F
Let chicken rest 5 minutes, then slice into strips
Toss romaine with Caesar dressing in large bowl
Top with sliced chicken, croutons, and Parmesan
Add extra pepper if desired, serve immediately

title: Beef Tacos
ingredients: Toppings: lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, sour cream
instructions: Heat large skillet over medium-high heat
Add ground beef, cook 5-6 minutes breaking up with spoon
Add onion and garlic, cook 3-4 minutes until softened
Add all spices, cook 1 minute until fragrant
Season with salt and pepper, remove from heat
Warm tortillas in dry skillet or microwave
Fill tortillas with beef mixture and desired toppings
Serve immediately with lime wedges

title: Salmon with Lemon Butter
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F
Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat
Sear salmon skin-side up 3-4 minutes until golden
Flip salmon, add butter, garlic, and lemon juice to pan
Transfer skillet to oven, bake 8-10 minutes until flakes easily
Sprinkle with lemon zest and dill before serving
Serve with vegetables or rice

title: Vegetable Curry
instructions: Heat oil in large pot over medium heat
Add onion, cook 5 minutes until softened
Add garlic and ginger, cook 1 minute until fragrant
Add curry powder, turmeric, and cayenne, cook 30 seconds
Add diced tomatoes, simmer 5 minutes until thickened
Add mixed vegetables and coconut milk, bring to boil
Reduce heat, simmer 15 minutes until vegetables are tender
Season with salt, garnish with cilantro, serve over rice

title: Pancakes
instructions: Whisk flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in large bowl
In separate bowl, beat eggs, then whisk in milk, melted butter, and vanilla
Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients, stir until just combined
Heat griddle or large skillet over medium heat, brush with butter
Pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake onto hot griddle
Cook until bubbles form on surface, about 2-3 minutes
Flip and cook until golden brown, 1-2 minutes more
Serve hot with butter and maple syrup

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Bring large pot of salted water to boil, cook spaghetti according to package directions
Cook bacon in large skillet until crispy, remove excess fat leaving 2 tablespoons
Add garlic to bacon fat, cook 1 minute until fragrant
Whisk eggs and Parmesan in large bowl with plenty of black pepper
Reserve 1 cup pasta water, drain spaghetti
Add hot pasta to skillet with bacon, toss off heat
Quickly add egg mixture, tossing constantly to create creamy sauce
Add pasta water as needed to achieve silky consistency, serve immediately

title: Chicken Noodle Soup
instructions: Heat olive oil in large pot over medium heat
Add onion, carrots, and celery, cook 5 minutes until softened
Add garlic, cook 1 minute until fragrant
Add chicken broth, chicken breasts, bay leaves, and thyme
Bring to boil, reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes
Remove chicken, shred with forks, return to pot
Add egg noodles, cook 8-10 minutes until tender
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with parsley before serving

title: Greek Salad
ingredients: 1 green bell pepper, cut in strips
instructions: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and bell pepper in large bowl
Add olives and crumbled feta cheese
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, and oregano in small bowl
Pour dressing over salad, toss gently to combine
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Let stand 10 minutes for flavors to meld
Serve at room temperature or chilled

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F
Whisk flour, baking soda, and salt in medium bowl
Beat butter and both sugars until creamy, about 2 minutes
Beat in eggs one at a time, then vanilla
Gradually mix in flour mixture until just combined
Stir in chocolate chips
Drop rounded tablespoons onto ungreased baking sheets
Bake 9-11 minutes until golden brown, cool on pan 2 minutes

title: Mushroom Risotto
ingredients: 6 cups warm chicken or vegetable broth
instructions: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in large skillet, sauté mushrooms until golden
Season mushrooms with salt, pepper, and thyme, set aside
Heat remaining oil and 1 tablespoon butter in heavy-bottomed pan
Add onion, cook 3 minutes until translucent
Add garlic and rice, stir 2 minutes until rice is lightly toasted
Add wine, stir until absorbed
Add warm broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly until absorbed
Continue for 18-20 minutes until rice is creamy, fold in mushrooms, butter, and Parmesan

title: BBQ Pulled Pork
instructions: Mix all dry seasonings in small bowl to make rub
Rub spice mixture all over pork shoulder, let sit 30 minutes
Preheat oven to 300°F
Place pork in roasting pan, cover tightly with foil
Cook 6-8 hours until meat shreds easily with fork
Remove from oven, let rest 15 minutes
Shred meat with two forks, discard excess fat
Mix shredded pork with BBQ sauce, serve on buns
